result.title: Weekly training #3: Graph Theory
result.content:
The break is over!
Tomorrow, will be a great day for starting again our weekly training. This time I emphasised on graph theory, and since there is much to say about it, I gathered for you a huge list of problems around 40 problems in total. I made the duration big enough, to let everyone work on its own pace.

I would like to thank PrinceOfPersia and Mikael for helping me setting this round.

Here is the scoreboard with the actual problems: scoreboard.

NOTE: If A2OJ is down, here is the full problem list.

Happy coding !
